title: Taubah (The Repentance) - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: what is the meaning of the word Toba and both in general terms I want to know it and in the Islamic context please literally means to return or to come back and in the Islamic context in the Sharia it means a person who leaves the things which Allah has prohibited and he returns back to the things which Allah has commanded so in short it means a person leaving the acts which Allah has prohibited and he returns back to the acts which Allah has commanded and this aspect of Toba or repentance is present in all the religions that believe in the concept of God and Allah speaks about tawba and repentance in the Quran in several places including surinur chapter number 24 verse number 31 where Allah says oh you believe turn all together in Repentance to Allah so that you may attain Bliss says that Allah loves those who turn to him in Repentance and Allah loves those who are clean and pure and a similar message is given in the Hadith it's mentioned inside bukhari verb number eight book of applications Hadith number 6309 where a beloved is more pleased when his servant seeks repentance than any one of you when he finds his camel which has been lost in the desert that means Allah is very pleased when anyone seeks his repentance ask for forgiveness and he forgives him so in short tawba means repentance which means leaving the ACT which is and returning back to the acts which he has commanded in short it's a journey from the dislike the thing which is like
